item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-24
item.description: Netflix Reportedly Hiring Executive For Expansion Into Video Games (2 minute read) Netflix is looking to do more with interactive entertainment after the success it found with Bandersnatch.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-28
item.description: SpaceX Starlink public beta begins (2 minute read) SpaceX has started to send email invitations to Starlink’s public beta.
